Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Change Shape, The Hag can polymorph into a female humanoid or back into her true form
Other Actions.Action 2: Etherealness, The Hag enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa
Other Actions.Action 3: Nightmare Haunting, While on the Ethereal Plane, the Hag can touch a sleeping humanoid a give it terrible visions

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Hag can cast some spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 3: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
